html: The CA wildfires were devastating. Today we worked across the aisle and won an additional $1.9 billion to help farmers rebuild. We have lots more to do, but this is a start. If you were effected by the wildfires call my office at (209) 579 5458 and we can help.pic.twitter.com/u8SLnrTXld
text:
The CA wildfires were devastating. Today we worked across the aisle and won an additional $1.9 billion to help farmers rebuild. We have lots more to do, but this is a start.

If you were effected by the wildfires call my office at (209) 579 5458 and we can help.pic.twitter.com/u8SLnrTXld

html: This is what is wrong with partisan politics. Immigration reform is needed, border security is needed. But we absolutely shouldn’t shut down the government because we can’t work together. Open the government and stop hurting families who need our government’s help.
text:
This is what is wrong with partisan politics. 

Immigration reform is needed, border security is needed. 

But we absolutely shouldn’t shut down the government because we can’t work together. Open the government and stop hurting families who need our government’s help.
